Response.Say: Hi, this is a call from Anandi Group, real estate developers trusted by over 1,000 happy customers. We’re now launching a premium 13-acre gated community on Ring Road, Ranchi — offering luxury living, lush greenery, and excellent connectivity. The project is surrounded by top institutions like Central University, IIIT Ranchi, the upcoming RIMS and Ranchi University, plus the new Ranchi Main Bus Stand.
